message: I lead the M2 (Materials Modeling) research team at Ajou University.

Our group merges first-principles calculations, finite element analysis (thermal, structural, chemical, etc.), and machine learning to study a broad spectrum of materials and processes in electronics and energy.
We will do our utmost to ensure the M2 research benefits universities, research centers, and industry alike.
